participant_1.background:
I love the rain, my cats, and photography.
My husband and I live on the outskirts of the city so we can afford a large home, but we still have access to all the city amenities.
My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto.
I am trying to lose weight by eating healthier and exercising.
i ca sim very fast.

participant_2.background:
I love eating McDonald's french fries, but I never tell my parents because they think they are unhealthy.
i make my own compost.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
I enjoy the sweet taste of mangoes.
I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name].
Hi, I'm [name].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw and paint.
What kind of art do you like to do?
I like to do landscapes and portraits.
That's cool. I like to take pictures of nature and animals.
I love nature. I have a compost pile in my backyard.
That's really cool. I've never tried composting before.
It's easy to do. You just need a pile of leaves, grass clippings, and vegetable scraps.
I might have to try that. I'm trying to be more environmentally friendly.
That's great. I'm glad to hear that.
What's your favorite kind of food?
I love mangoes. They're so sweet and juicy.
Mangoes are my favorite fruit too. I like to eat them with a little salt.
That sounds delicious. I'm going to have to try that.
I'm glad I could give you a new idea for a snack.
Thanks. I appreciate it.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk about food.
Me too. It's one of my favorite topics.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too
